title: （行動post）突發！我去左搵外國政黨政客傾計！

replies.msg:
超過半年的抗爭，香港人不但經歷了行動的升級，亦要有思想上的升級。每個人都不要劃地自限，在團體中保持個體的獨立性，主動諗多步做多步。
五大訴求，本質是要主權在民，所以我們必須有雙普選，在民選政府下執行其他訴求才有意義。香港現在受國際關注，1/1/2020有至少38名來自18個國家的國會議員及宗教界等人士聯署向香港特首林鄭月娥發出公開信促請林鄭月娥推動政改，美國《香港人權與民主法案》更設下2020年普選立法會的時限，並明確要求普選特首。所以香港人絕對要主動積極要求2020年落實普選立法會，連結內外戰線，設下死線逼使港共政府回應。
我早前寄了email給各國的政黨及政客，表達了作為香港人希望各國共同捍衛人權自由民主的意願，但人微言輕，如果大家思考過後都認同這行動，希望各位都能寄email，聚沙成塔。(我在下面放了email sample及相關email addresses，大家可以按自己想法修改email內容及加減email addresses)

Email sample(Petition letter for Hong Kong 2020 universal suffrage )
Dear Sir/Madam,

I am writing on behalf of fellow HongKongers to sincerely thank for your concern and attention in relation to the current Hong Kong democratic movement for protecting human rights, liberty and democracy.

CCP and HK government use HK Police Force to suppress HongKongers for dictatorship and led HK into a Police State. It is much more than police brutality. HK Police Force has unlimited power and turns into a terrorist organization. The police officers disregard human rights and rule of law and do whatever they want with military weapons, including breaking into private places, intimidating people to jeopardize their lives and properties, arresting and torturing people with excessive force for personal desire and mood.

HK government is unable to tackle police terrorists because they rely on the military army to execute dictatorship. It exposes the failure of current election system in which Legislative council and Chief Executive are not responsible to HongKongers but to CCP. Through current election system, CCP can utilize SCNPC to decide who can be Chief Executive and Functional Constituency Councillors in Legislative Council. Chief Executive then works for CCP and Functional Constituency monopolizes the Legislative Council to pass the policies proposed by HK government. As a result, CCP can make use of HK to strengthen its power and spread its invasion over the world.

CCP is now carrying out ethnic cleansing in HK, for example sending Mainland Chinese population to HK and turn them into HK citizens through the policies. If universal suffrage is passed after years, it will lose its meaning and effect as CCP will have turned HK population into CCP supporters and use fake democratic and judicial system to deceive the world.

It is urgent for Hong Kong to have universal suffrage in 2020. The Legislative Council and Chief Executive under universal suffrage, which is not meddled by CCP, can be truly monitored by HongKongers, so that HongKongers can stand with the world to protect universal values. It can ensure that people from different countries can have economic, cultural, social and political activities in HK with freedom and judicial independence. I believe by international investigation and enactment of law to impose assets and visas blocking sanctions against the government officials of P.R.C. and HK governments and related people who are in operation with or contributed to the suppression or violation of HongKongers’ human rights and basic liberties, HK government must respond to HongKongers’ will for universal values. If HK government continues the dictatorship and does not apply universal suffrage in 2020, it is reasonable for other countries to make sanctions like cancelling HK tariff preferences.

I humbly ask you to stand with Hong Kong and protect the universal human rights, liberty and democracy. We are beyond grateful for your time.

Yours Sincerely,
A Hong Kong citizen

可唔可以為每個國家加一段佢地specific context 有關既呢，屁如：
美國...as a world leader, you should...
英國...as a signing party of the Joint Declaration...you should...
歐盟...as the greatest political entity on earth....
德國...as the one...etc 呢？
謝謝！
脷伸：一定send比我本區MP！
推下先

文宣組 /舉牌/噴字/國際戰線手足，請你們準備最新字句和圖片、 我們要務必要登上各地財經版頭條
我們要針對四大類人；律師、股東、基金持有人、當地選民

1、美/歐/日律師們，你們發達了，即時告知客戶們，控告銀行或基金經理投資中國， 因為完全缺乏透明度， 黑箱作業根本長期損害投資者利益。

2、擁有銀行股票的股東或基金持有人，必須要求銀行和基金經理對中國貸款極多擔保物/極高利息回報

3、 債務堆積如山的中國就是龐氏計劃； 沒有新債支持、舊債就即時爆煲。各地選民請質問議員/總統候選人，為何仍投資邪惡又不能還款的中國

To save Hong Kong , Stop all loan to China！
Loan to China only after HK Referendum！

必定要對外國政客講，香港是新西柏林 ，對付中共最好在香港，不要在他們的國家

要救就救香港先
推推推推

好有心
推

超過半年的抗爭，香港人不但經歷了行動的升級，亦要有思想上的升級。每個人都不要劃地自限，在團體中保持個體的獨立性，主動諗多步做多步。
五大訴求，本質是要主權在民，所以我們必須有雙普選，在民選政府下執行其他訴求才有意義。香港現在受國際關注，1/1/2020有至少38名來自18個國家的國會議員及宗教界等人士聯署向香港特首林鄭月娥發出公開信促請林鄭月娥推動政改，美國《香港人權與民主法案》更設下2020年普選立法會的時限，並明確要求普選特首。所以香港人絕對要主動積極要求2020年落實普選立法會，連結內外戰線，設下死線逼使港共政府回應。
我早前寄了email給各國的政黨及政客，表達了作為香港人希望各國共同捍衛人權自由民主的意願，但人微言輕，如果大家思考過後都認同這行動，希望各位都能寄email，聚沙成塔。(我在下面放了email sample及相關email addresses，大家可以按自己想法修改email內容及加減email addresses)

Email sample(Petition letter for Hong Kong 2020 universal suffrage )
Dear Sir/Madam,

I am writing on behalf of fellow HongKongers to sincerely thank for your concern and attention in relation to the current Hong Kong democratic movement for protecting human rights, liberty and democracy.

CCP and HK government use HK Police Force to suppress HongKongers for dictatorship and led HK into a Police State. It is much more than police brutality. HK Police Force has unlimited power and turns into a terrorist organization. The police officers disregard human rights and rule of law and do whatever they want with military weapons, including breaking into private places, intimidating people to jeopardize their lives and properties, arresting and torturing people with excessive force for personal desire and mood.

HK government is unable to tackle police terrorists because they rely on the military army to execute dictatorship. It exposes the failure of current election system in which Legislative council and Chief Executive are not responsible to HongKongers but to CCP. Through current election system, CCP can utilize SCNPC to decide who can be Chief Executive and Functional Constituency Councillors in Legislative Council. Chief Executive then works for CCP and Functional Constituency monopolizes the Legislative Council to pass the policies proposed by HK government. As a result, CCP can make use of HK to strengthen its power and spread its invasion over the world.

CCP is now carrying out ethnic cleansing in HK, for example sending Mainland Chinese population to HK and turn them into HK citizens through the policies. If universal suffrage is passed after years, it will lose its meaning and effect as CCP will have turned HK population into CCP supporters and use fake democratic and judicial system to deceive the world.

It is urgent for Hong Kong to have universal suffrage in 2020. The Legislative Council and Chief Executive under universal suffrage, which is not meddled by CCP, can be truly monitored by HongKongers, so that HongKongers can stand with the world to protect universal values. It can ensure that people from different countries can have economic, cultural, social and political activities in HK with freedom and judicial independence. I believe by international investigation and enactment of law to impose assets and visas blocking sanctions against the government officials of P.R.C. and HK governments and related people who are in operation with or contributed to the suppression or violation of HongKongers’ human rights and basic liberties, HK government must respond to HongKongers’ will for universal values. If HK government continues the dictatorship and does not apply universal suffrage in 2020, it is reasonable for other countries to make sanctions like cancelling HK tariff preferences.

I humbly ask you to stand with Hong Kong and protect the universal human rights, liberty and democracy. We are beyond grateful for your time.

Yours Sincerely,
A Hong Kong citizen

1. 黎個遊行/集會向美領及國會提交普選細節，及寫信、twitter比國會議員，亦要叫IAD，攬炒團隊，gphone，現任立法會議員幫手（see post #1)

2. 加入工會，全民三罷 逼港共中共退讓
（當年波蘭都係靠罷工lin贏共產政權
https://www.instagram.com/p/B4Z-paCn0zr/?igshid=1jridkza9vxy8 ）

3. 尋求將普選放在trade deal phase 2
［國際戰線第一步］［聯署］將香港真雙普選推上中美貿易談判桌

取消功能組,2020全面普選立法會
取消功能組,2020全面普選立法會

1. 在荒廢的連儂牆上張貼「2020年普選立法會」、「2020年取消功能組別」、「押後立會選舉，直至全面直選」、「功能組別贏，香港民主輸」、「立會無直選，香港聽制裁」之類的標語；

2. 政黨發起聯署要求2020年全面直選立會，取消功能組別，呈交政府逼官僚系統開始回應，納入政治議程；

3. 政黨及民間去信中共中聯辦(睇情況)、中華民國新政府（1月11日有結果）、台灣各大政黨、英國保守黨與工黨、德國綠黨、基民盟及社民黨、美國駐港大使館、美國《香港人權民主法》起草人、澳洲自由黨及工黨、歐洲議會《香港法案》聯署人、南韓共民黨及自韓黨、日本自民黨及民進黨、加拿大自由黨、工黨及魁北克人黨、荷蘭外長、波蘭外長、捷克外長、亞美尼亞外長、巴西外長等等，促請支持香港落實《中英聯合聲明》中一國兩制、高度自治、港人治港的要求，以及即年全面民主直選香港議會；

4. 政黨及民間去信聯合國託管理事會主席Anne Gueguen，促請重新檢討理事會停運後的職能，主動維護脫殖地區的民主與人權狀況；

5. 黃之鋒等說客繼續與民主共和兩黨接觸，公開懇請美方支持香港2020年直選立法會，否則在9月選舉結束後，在《香港人權民主法》的年度報告譴責，可動議要求美國商務部撰寫報告，向國會說明取消香港獨立關稅區的影響，繼而祭出制裁方案；

6. 警告各區選舉主任，倘利用行政手段DQ剝奪任何香港人的政治權利終身，自負被美國列入制裁名單的後果；

7. 拒絕將9月選舉結果定性為民主公投；
